pageTitle: Best Financial Advisors in Delray Beach
metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Delray Beach. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

advisors.name: Merrill Lynch Financial Advisor Jeff Kaplan

heroDescription: Delray Beach, Florida, is a vibrant coastal city known for its beautiful beaches and thriving arts scene.
landscapeDescription: Delray Beach has a diverse economy primarily driven by tourism, retail, and healthcare. The city is experiencing steady growth, attracting new residents and businesses.
uniqueNeeds: Delray Beach requires a focus on sustainable tourism and housing affordability.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Delray's tourism reliance poses economic risks; housing market volatility may lead to affordability issues. Prepare for hurricane impacts and diversify local industries.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Delray Beach's economy grew by 3.5% last year, driven by tourism and healthcare sectors.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Delray Beach is approximately $70,000, reflecting a mix of affluent and middle-class households.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Delray Beach are increasingly focusing on retirement planning and wealth management.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), the cost of living in Delray Beach is 15% higher than the national average, driven by housing and healthcare costs.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), the median home price in Delray Beach is around $450,000, with a competitive market and rising demand.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Delray Beach's business climate is favorable, with supportive local policies encouraging small business growth.
